titleStmt.title: The method of curing vvounds made by gun-shot Also by arrowes and darts, with their accidents. Written by Ambrose Parie of Laual, counsellor and chiefe chirurgean to the French King. Faithfully done into English out of the French copie, by Walter Hamond chirurgean.
Methode de traicter les playes faictes par hacquebutes et aultres bastons à feu. English
titleStmt.author: Paré, Ambroise, 1510?-1590.

titleStmt.title: The method of curing vvounds made by gun-shot Also by arrowes and darts, with their accidents. Written by Ambrose Parie of Laual, counsellor and chiefe chirurgean to the French King. Faithfully done into English out of the French copie, by Walter Hamond chirurgean.
Methode de traicter les playes faictes par hacquebutes et aultres bastons à feu. English
titleStmt.author: Paré, Ambroise, 1510?-1590.
Hamond, Walter, fl. 1643.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Isaac Iaggard, and are to be sold in Barbican,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: La methode de traicter les playes faictes par hacquebutes et aultres bastons à feu.
